body_html:
@smartcat2010
Hi,
I tried your mnist_softmax.py.txt example and did run it on 1 parameter server and 2 workers.
Unfortunately, I get a two times longer runtime with using 2 workers compared to using only 1 worker.
Can you confirm this behavior?
A feedback would be great!

body:
@smartcat2010 
Hi,
I tried your mnist_softmax.py.txt example and did run it on 1 parameter server and 2 workers.
Unfortunately, I get a two times longer runtime with using 2 workers compared to using only 1 worker.
Can you confirm this behavior?
A feedback would be great!
